author: James
content:
Keith, that's a good suggestion for children after all, good programmers can make decent money & increase productivity. I doubt the education (here or elsewhere) is really designed to teach people to think. Check out Seth Godin's book titled "stop stealing dreams". Think it is a good read for parents & all alike. It's a free pdf, just search for it.

About hacking, I think older people would have no interest unless they got hacked, identity stolen etc. So education campaigns may be a better way to create awareness.
